name: Solitaire Enchanted Deck
description:
A mysterious disappearance of the Peregriff family ...

An enthusiastic young Englishman, Daniel Peregriff, determined to uncover the mistery of his family ...

A secret of the Enchanted Deck of cards that could change the fate of the Peregriff family ...

Play this free Solitaire card game and try hundreds of challenging solitaire puzzles in the spirit of this spellbinding story!

Find out the secret of the Enchanted Deck by joining Daniel on this captivating, poignant trek spanning many countries of the central Europe as he bravely tries to reclaim a family heirloom.

FEATURES:

- Easy and fun patience game, with the Tutorial to pick up quick
- Over 1000 fantastic solitaire levels with amazing beautiful graphics and original soundtrack
- Pyramid Solitaire with events, challenges, and rewards
- Travel across Europe of the early 20th century and feel its unique atmosphere!
- Complete the tasks on your journey and free the enchanted cards!
- Compete against powerful bosses with unique skills who will try to stop you!
- Build the family estate and receive magic bonuses!
- More fantastic levels, card puzzles and challenging tasks with our regular updates!

If you're tired of playing classic card games, similar puzzle games and boring match 3 clones, join this fascinating story of the Solitaire Enchanted Deck for fun and for a good brain exercise!
